name: Gelli Farm in Space
description:
This is my contribution to the Gelli Jam. There isn't any goal, it's just a pretty lil clicker thing in which you feed lil blobs and keep them happy.

Controls:
- Left mouse to select
- Middle mouse to move camera and zoom

Collect candies and berries, feed your Gellies, pet them, and be happy! 

Edit: In my browser, the WebGL build hated the camera controls, so I re-uploaded the game as an .exe.
